about_the_game:
From the creators of The Picture of Café au lait, AstralSeal presents their third original visual novel – Re:Fragment ~Absolute Ambition~. In this game, there is a unique school where everyone can vote on proposals, and the ideas that receive the majority of votes become new rules.

FEATURES:

  • Multiple endings, 7-9 hours of story

  • Can easily be played with one hand

  • All artwork in Full HD (1080p)

  • Intriguing mystery that unfolds itself as the story advances

LANGUAGES:

  • Text: English, Thai (ภาษาไทย)

  • Voice Acting: Thai - 6 Characters


Silverseal Private Academy is a pioneering model school where students have the unique opportunity to shape their school environment democratically. Decisions are made collectively by voting and those that secure a majority are enacted as policies.

Kusaka Yuuma, the main protagonist, is the treasurer of the student council. He works alongside his childhood friend Kuromiya Reika, the popular and respected student council president. She is a ray of sunshine that commands the attention of people wherever she goes.

Yuuma lives a tranquil student life, blissfully unaware of the storm brewing on the horizon. That is, until Reika unveils a new controversial policy that sparks widespread debate. Disrupting their lives and turning their world upside down, changing everything they once knew forever.

This is the story of ambitious teenagers confronted with a reality far removed from their expectations. Will they be able to navigate a life that sabotages them at every turn? It all depends on “you”.

Kuromiya Reika
Flawless Student Council President

Character's Voice: Pugko

Silverseal Private Academy student council president. She excels at every aspect, boasting an outstanding academic performance with top grades for every subject in her year. The only subject that she can never ace is Math, where she is beaten by our protagonist Yuuma.

She is confident and treats everyone equally. This has won her the trust of not only all of the students, but the entire school faculty as well.

Contrary to her appearance, she loves cute rabbit dolls and has never told anyone.

Kusaka Yuno
Avid Mobile Gacha Gamer Little Sister

Character's Voice: AidenShia

The protagonist's little sister. She studies remotely through a homeschooling system and doesn't attend school like other kids her age due to her frail health. Because of this, she is extremely shy and anxious when meeting strangers, except for her brother.

As she is mostly confined to her home, her hobby is mainly playing gacha games. She spends a lot of money on them and has become one of the top 10 players on the server.

Shirasaki Maya
Kind-hearted and Trendy Girl

Character's Voice: Furorin

An upperclassman who is friendly and gets along effortlessly with everyone. With her attractive figure and charm, she undoubtedly always becomes the center of attention.

It's said that many boys have confessed their love for her, but her response is always the same: “Sorry, I'm not interested in romance right now.”

Her dream is to become a fashion designer and launch her own clothing brand in the future.

Yanagihara Risa
Student Council Advisor + Teacher

Character's Voice: Karin Tsutsuji

Iwano Akane
Discipline Committee Member

Character's Voice: Reilim

Kataoka Kazuma
Student Council Vice President

Character's Voice: Ryuji

Scenario Writer/Director: coregameHD
Artist/Character Design: Rayedge / Woofy
Programming: AstralAria

Cast:
Reika - Pugko
Yuno - AidenShia
Maya - Furorin
Akane - Reilim
Kazuma - Ryuji
Risa-sensei - Karin

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: We all dream of a bright future ahead, but life doesn't always turn out how we expect. Yuuma, the protagonist, lives a peaceful life until the student council president proposes a new controversial policy that changes everything they once knew forever.
